description: Takeda is one of Ping Pong Clubs two `pretty boys`. Takeda has a bowl haircut with short bangs, and he is also the crush of female character Kiyoko. He even has a whole episode devoted to him fondling her breasts (in which http://anidb.net/ch8267 [Maeno], http://anidb.net/ch8268 [Izawa], and http://anidb.net/ch8271 [Tanaka] are all hiding naked in a locker).
name: Takeda
